name: Tekteker
description:
"Tekteker" is a balance game.

You will fall many times till learn to drive. You will be angry at yourself... And maybe at me for making this game...

5 levels, each one is harder then other, and a time challenge game that you need to avoid to drop the ball. Of course you have to complete level 1 to unlock time challenge.

You have to hold the button and slide left or right for balancing the unicycle.

Good luck ;)
